thumb.title: 【Starry】M@GICAL☆CURE! LOVE SHOT!【踊ってみた】- Dance Cover
thumb.description: Greetings, everyone!I have a cure for all of your sadness and worries today. Let's don our frilly outfits and chase all those monsters away...!I am really excited to finally be able to bring you my cover of this adorable song! This choreography was so much fun to learn and perform, I just love how bouncy and energetic it is~Please enjoy it! Hmm, it's also probably important to mention that I am wearing ice-skating tights and dance shorts underneath my outfit in this video.Well, that's all for now. Keep shining out there everybody--and let's all be magically bright invincible girls and boys together! Music reference: sm43654892Choreography reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lR1F1Rdo7ZY★~Where to find me~★Twitter: https://twitter.com/starrylights13Instagram: @starrylights13 - https://www.instagram.com/starrylights13/?hl=enYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/StarryLights13MyList: mylist/62719107
thumb.last_res_body: 可愛いわぁ うぽつー うぽつ ８８８８８８８８... 8888888888 かわいい うぽつです

tags.tag: コスプレで踊ってみた
